"Wanted, dead or alive. Smitty Bacall and The Smitty Bacall Gang. For murder and stagecoach robbery. Seven thousand dollars for Smitty Bacall. One thousand and five hundred dollars for each of his gang members.

You want me to play a black slaver? There ain't nothin lower then a black slaver. Black slavers are lower then head house niggers, and buddy, that's pretty fuckin low.

One could almost say, you a nigger.

He's your nigger.

Well, him bein' German an' all, I'm a little more use to American's then he is. Now Monsieur Candie, whenever you're ready, we rode five hours so you could show off your stock. Let's git to it.

I've known me House Niggers like you my whole life. Play your dog tricks with your Massa'. Ya' lip off to him every now an' then, as long as ya' keep it funny. He rolls his eyes and puts up with it, and all the white folks think it's so cute.
Oh that's right, he gives you first name privileges... . ain't that cute. Sass me me again nigger, see what happen'.

How'd you like to make eleven thousand dollars?
How would you like to make eleven thousand dollars -- eleven thousand five hundred, actually?
Keep riding, just ride slower.
Back at that plantation Candyland, there was an eleven thousand five hundred dollar fortune just sittin there, and y'all rode right past it.
That's what's nice about this fortune, it's not illegal. You can't steal it, ya gotta earn it.
The eleven thousand five hundred dollar fortune waiting for you back at Candyland, is in the form of a wanted dead or alive bounty on Smitty Bacall and the Smitty Bacall Gang.
Smitty Bacall is the leader of a murdering gang of stagecoach robbers, The Bacall Gang.
The Court.

The Austin Texas Courthouse. Oh, and by the way, the court don't give a damn about how you kill 'em. You can shoot 'em in the back, from up on a hill, in the back of the head, in their sleep - don't matter.
Court doesn't care how you do it, just as long as you do it.
No. You kill 'em, and they payyou for the corpse. Get it?
Killed innocent people in a stagecoach robbery. I've got the handbill in my pocket.

I ain't no goddamn slave. Do I sound-like a fuckin slave? I'm a bounty hunter.
I ain't tellin' who they are. But, you give me a pistol, and a horse, and five hundred dollars of that eleven thousand five hundred, and I'll point 'em out to you.

Y'all wanna ask somebody if I'm tellin the truth, ask them mandingos. You can't put me in the same cage with them without them killin me. Why ya think that is? Ask them .am I a Candyland slave, or did I ride in there on a horse, with a white man, yesterday?
I got one more condition.
When we get there, when the time comes, you let me help you kill 'em.

Saddle up Fritz and Tony.
Now, boy!

We're in his little shack at the Carrucan Plantation. It's PISSING RAIN outside. Django is making love to his wife Broomhilda, when she stops letting out a shout. The three overseers known as THE BRITTLE BROTHERS are outside peeking in through the window. They BURST in through the front door. Soaked to the bone, they rodeo bull their way into the shack, and make the two slaves continue fucking for their amusement.
He remembers Ellis Brittle BURNING a "r" into Broomhilda's cheek with a  BRANDING IRON.
It',s still pretty early, we won't be open for about a hour. But by then we'll be servin' breakfast -

INSERT: Calvin signing over Broomhilda's BILL OF SALE.
Okay boys, fun's over, come on out.
Now why y'all wanna come into my town, start trouble, and scare all these nice people? You ain't got nothin' better to do, then to come into Bill Sharps town and show your ass -
What did you jus' do to our sheriff?
Move that buckboard over there long ways across the street from the saloon. And I want six men and six Winchesters behind it.
Yes it is, this is U.S. Marshall Gill Tatum.
You mean like you did our sheriff? Shot 'em down like a dog in the street!
Well, as much as we'd all enjoy seein' somethin' like that, ain't nobody gonna cheat the hangman in my town!
You unarmed?
Go on!
The hell you say!

Dr.SCHULTZ Do slaves believe in marriage'?

I said niggers -

C'mon inside, get yourself something' cool to drink.

Now unless they start shootin' first, nobody shoot 'em. That's way too simple for these jokers. We're gonna whip that nigger lover to death. And I'm gonna personally, strip and clip that garboon myself.

Django isn't a slave. Django is a free man. Do you understand? You're not to treat him like any of these other niggers around here, cause he ain't like any of these other niggers around here. Ya got it?

Yes, I can see that.
What's the name of that peckawood boy from town works with the glass? His mama works at the lumber yard? He comes by and fixes the winda's when we have a problem?

You know Jerry, dont'cha sugar?
Well that's it then... just treat 'em like you would Jerry.
Oh I got my share of, coal blacks, horse faces, and gummy mouth bitches out in the field. But the lion share of my lady niggers are real show pony's.

Django?

Now Jody quit your caterwaulin'. You know yourself it's for your own good. Niggers are clumsy. You'd break everything in goddamn sight, you weren't cured. And the only known cure for nigger clumsiness is a peelin'.

goes into shock... .he falls to his knees...he looks up, clutching his heart, at Django.

Ain't nobody gonna touch you and your Jimmie while you on my property. But for lettin' a nigger kill a white man, and especially for letting a nigger kill a white man in a audience of niggers, y'all ain't gonna make it out of the county alive. lying on his belly in the grass.

Fuck all y'all! I'm going home. I watched my wife work all day gettin' thirty bags ready for you ungrateful sonsabitches!
Not too good. I mean if I.don't move my head, I can see you pretty good ... . more or less.

I think we all think the bags was a nice idea. But, not pointing any fingers, they could of been done better. So how 'bout, no bags this time, but next time, we do the bags right, and then we go full regalia.
No, no one brought a extra bag!
But nobody can see.

Do we hafta wear 'em when we ride?

up in a tree, FIRING DOWN ON them.

Just leave 'em out here, they ain't going nowhere. And if'in they do, god must love 'em, so who are we to say. Come outta the snowy snow and git yourself some coffee.

What we also saw in the above montage is Django shake off a lifetime of slavery. Django, in his green jacket, in his cowboy hat, on top of his steed Tony, with his gun hanging from his hip, has become his own man.
CHICKASAW COUNTY, MISSISSIPPI Dr.Schultz takes in this African flesh market, where human beings sell other human beings, with disgust and a little bit of shock.
The TRAIN, at a earlier time, pulling into the depot.

Characters.Character: A GIGGLING LEERING GROUP OF BROTHERS

Replies.Reply: make a bid.
On that day, eight months ago, the auction was won by Mike Harmony, as a birthday present for his fat boy son Scotty.
Basically The Harmony's bought a slave bride for young master Scotty that day.
As Scotty's sort of defacto sweetheart, if no visitors were about, Broomhilda would even join the family at their dinner table.
Scotty was never happier.
After three months of this bliss, Scotty decided to take Broomhilda for a romantic weekend in Greenville.

And two, there was a sliver of society that ran through Greenville at night that catered to white masters who were infected with a condition that was normally referred to as, "Nigger love." At night the streets, the bars, bistros, and buggy rides were ruled by rich white masters showing off their pretty Pony's.
But the crown jewel of all this interracial frivolity, was the members only, Cleopatra Club.
Then... speak of the devil and the devil appears.
After excusing herself, she walked across the street to her hotel room. She got her white dress dirty in the mud, but she didn't care, the night was ruined anyway.

Back at The Cleopatra Club, as the night wore on, Calvin Candie suggested'a friendly card game. As the game wore on, it came down to a two thousand dollar pot between Calvin Candie and Scotty Harmony. Luckily for him, Scotty was holding.a inside straight.
That was four months ago.
This is for you.
They're jelly beans. Try one.
Good huh?
Yes Broomhilda?
Please, I'd love that.
I gotta tell you Broomhilda -
Thank you so much, it's a great honor.
Please, by all means.
We just joined this weekend.
Well said, and money well spent.
What?
Really? Thank you Sheba, I think you're beautiful.
Well, she's your Pony...I mean...
I'm all in.
I would think a southern gentleman of such renown as yourself, wouldn't have to resort to buying a pot in his own club.
What? I don't want her.
I'm all out of money.
I can't bet Broomhilda.
Let me see your cards!
You cheated me.
I called you a card cheatin' son of a bitch, cause that's what you are!
Wait a minute ...no!
I ain't dueling with you! I don't want to duel!
Sure. Let me just get my girl.
Wait!... . Look ... . Mr.Candie, I'm sorry I called you a cheat. But... please...I can't give you Broomhilda.
appears at their table.
Hello, my name is Calvin Candie, I own The Cleopatra Club. And I would just like to welcome an attractive couple'like yourselves to my favorite place on earth.
May I join you?-
How long have you been a member?

Well our little private oasis appreciates your patronage. Some may consider the dues excessive, but they're necessary for us to create this haven for the alternative lifestyle we've all become accustomed to.
It would be.my pleasure, your first weekend at the club, to join me and my friends at my table.
Not so fast, boy.
Pot ain't fat enough yet.
Ain't that too bad.
One final raise.
It's Sheba's bill of sale.
You sure didn't look like you didn't want her.
In Greenville slaves are currency. And Sheba's worth about eight hundred dollars.
But we ain't playin' for money no more..
In Chickasaw County, she's money. Pony her up or fold. Somebody get him a piece of paper and a pencil.
Write out a bill of sale, or fold them cards.
What did you just call me?
Scott Harmony. For calling me a card cheat in my own club, as a southern gentleman, I challenge you to a duel.
Piano player, will you hit three separate notes?
On the third note, pick up the gun and try to kill me.
Piano player please ...
Then get out of here, get in your buggy and get out of town.
You lost that girl, fat boy.
Last chance fat boy, go home and get'useta to fuckin' another one.
Or pick up that gun.
Welcome to Candyland.
Why do you want to get in the mandingo business?
Quit stalling and answer the question.
Well come on over, cause we gotta us a fight goin on that's a good bit of fun_ Dr.Schultz steps up to get a better look at the savage fight.
The other nigger belongs to this disreputable Italian gentlemen to my right. Amerigo Vassepi.
What's your nigger's name?
How 'bout you, boy? You find nigger fightin' a good bit of fun?
How'd you two like to try the signature drink of the club?
Roscoe, two Polynesian Pearl Divers, and don't spare the rum.
Arrivederci Luigi! Well, Mr.Vassepi, looks like you owe me ten dollars.
What's your name, boy?
Where'd ya dig him up?
I've heard tell about you. I heard you're a real bright boy.
I'm curious, what makes you such a mandingo expert?
Calm down Bartholomew, gentle... gentle.
Doc, I'm a seasoned slaver, you are a neophyte. I'm simply trying to ascertain if this cowboy is taking advantage of you.
No we weren't talking business yet. We were discussing my curiosity.
So Bright Boy,.Moguy here tells me you looked over my African flesh, and were none too impressed.
Well then we got nothing more to talk about. You wanna buy a beat ass nigger from me, those are the beat ass niggers I wanna sell.
I don't sell the niggers I don't wanna sell.
What do you consider ridiculous?
Gentlemen, you had my curiosity. Now you got my attention.
How ya like that meat, Bright Boy?
How's your Catfish, dew drop?
You spend a lot of time around niggers aside from Freeman here?
Well if'in you did,.you'd know what a treat this was for 'em. You feel special Coco?
You feel special Bartholomew?
Now Sheba always feels special. Dont'cha?
How 'bout you Bright Boy, you feel special?
Well we're leaving bright and early tomorrow morning, and moving the. whole kit and caboodle to "Candyland."
Oh hardly a ride at all, We'll still be in Chickasaw County. Five hours.. .tops.
I swear you two are cozier then a couple of cuttle fish.
Oh by now, I don't think that would surprise meat all.
Excuse me a moment, gentlemen.
Billy Crash, git up here!
Find out what that goddamn commotion is up at the tracker shack!
You know, confidentially, just 'tween us girls, worse things about this business, ain't the slaves. It's all the white trash ya gotta deal with.

Now these inbred hillbillies, on the other hand, they can barely speak English. I can't understand a damn word most of 'em say. You could teach a plow horse how to make a pot of coffee, 'fore you teach those fools how to use a knife and fork. I tell ya, if it wasn't for catchin' a nigger on the run, they'd be as useless as tits on a boar hog.
What the hell's goin on?
Who?
Well I'll be, D'Artagnan. Now boy, why do a fool thing like run off?
Oh yes you can. You might not be able to win, but your ass can fight. - Mr.Stonesipher, shut these goddamn dogs up, I can't hear myself think!
How long was he loose?
How far he git off property?
Moguy, who was D'Artagnan suppose to fight Friday?.
Well the way he looks now a blind Indian wouldn't bet 'a bead on 'em.
Boy, you done made yourself as useless as a tail on a teddy bear.
Now now, no beggin', no playin' on my soft heart. You in trouble now, son.
Well, yes you did. But that last one, you muddied the line between winning and losing.

You will?
You'll pay five hundred dollars for a one eyed Ole'Joe, ain't fit to push a broom?
You'll hafta excuse Mr.Stonesipher's slack jawed gaze. He ain't never seen a nigger like you ever in his life..Ain't that right, Mr. Stonesipher?

Dr.Schultz, this attractive southern belle is my widowed sister, may I present to you, Lara Lee Candie-Fitzwilly.

Half the reason I invited them. I thought you'd find.them as intriguing as I do little sister.

Ace, this here is Dr.Ring Schultz, and Django Freeman, they're big customers with big pockets wanna buy a big nigger. So I brought 'em out here so you could give 'em a little display of our African flesh.

Five real strong bucks.
We still got three left.
What do you think?
What's wrong with them?

Yes.

All three are champions.

Can Eskimo Joe whip Sampson, no. Can he take Goldie, probably not - Goldie's the best dirty fightin' nigger I ever saw. But as long as you don't put 'em up against those two., Eskimo Joe will whip any niggers ass.

Dr.Schultz, i will have you know, there is no one in the nigger fight game that appreciates the value of showmanship more then, Monsieur Calvin J. Candie. But one must not forget the most important thing in the nigger fight game.

A nigger that can win fights. That should be your first, second, third, four, and fifth concern. After you have that, and you know you have that, then, you can start to implement a grande design. But since I enjoy oldest man 'at the table status - beating Moguy by one year for that honor allow the old sage to advise, first things first.
I see you two gettin' on?
Hell, I can't imagine two weeks in Boston.

wasn't it?

Splendid.

When you was alone with Hildi here, didja just speak German, or did ya git her clothes off?
So you haven't seen her back?
Then Stephen's right, you would probably find this interesting. Hildi, take off your dress, and show us your back.

But Lara Lee, Dr.Schultz is from Dusseldorf, they don't got niggers there. And he's a man of medicine. I'm sure it would fascinate him, the niggers endurance for pain. Those lyin' goddamn.time wastin' sonsabitches!
Sonsabitches! You just watch, I'm gonna fix their wagon but good! Stephen, we .gonna have us a Candyland tar and feathering!
Lara Lee, I just looked out the big winda.
Can I ask you two gentlemen to look over your shoulder?
Now lay your palms flat on the table top.
Now you lift those palms off that turtle shell table top, Bartholomew gonna let loose with both barrels of that sawed off.
Now where were we? Oh yes, I do believe you were just getting ready to make me a proposition to buy Broomhilda. Right?

Now it should be quite clear by now I know you're not here to buy no mandingos.
Now the way I see it, ain't nothin' changed..
Under the laws of Chickasaw County, Broomhilda is my property. And I can do anything with my property I so desire.
And if you think my price for this nigger is too steep, what I'm gonna desire to do is, take this hammer and beat her ass to death with it. Right in front of both y'all.

It's a custom here in the South, once a business deal is concluded, for the two parties to shake hands. It implies good faith.

You know what I think you are?

I insist.

She says she thinks you're cute.
Sheba says she'd like to give you a little lip. Want some lip?
Oh hush, what's a little nigger lip 'tween friends. Go on honey, give 'em some sugar.

Yes you may.
When a man likes a cold drink, a man likes a COLD drink.

Everybody don't laugh at him, you're being polite, I understand, you mean well, but it just encourages him.

Calm-the-fuck-down, sit down, and let's discuss this.

Now look, you knew, and I knew, there was something up with these two. We just didn't know what. But now we do. They don't want you to know how bad they want that girl. But these ole boys have rode a lotta miles, went t6 a whole lotta trouble, and done spread a whole lotta bull to get this girl. They must want her mighty bad. Way I see it, ain't nothin' changed. They wanna buy a nigger, you wanna sell a nigger.The only thing done changed is the advantage.

I bet you an' that German thought y'all was on easy street for awhile - didn't ya?
And that's where you met me. And that's when you knew your goose was cooked.
Now that fancy talkin' white man of yours didn't know what's what. He still thought his ass hadda chance. But like the One-Eyed Charly you are, you always know the end is near 'fore the white folks.
Damn Nigger, you smell good.
You know, when you was sittin' on that feather bed in the quest room in the Big House -
You leavin', that's what you can take with you.

Now you were quite the topic of conversation for the last few hours. Seemed like folks never had a bright idea in their life, was comin' up with different ways to kill your ASS. Now most of 'dem ideas involved fuckin wit your fun parts. But while that might SEEM like a good idea. Truth is, once ya snip a niggers nuts, most bleed out. Then I say; "Hells bells, the niggers we send to LeQuint Dickey, got it worse then that." Then they're, "Let's whip 'em to death," "Throw 'em to the mandingos," "Feed 'em to Stonesipher's dogs."
So Miss Lara got the bright idea of givin' your ass to The LeQuint Dickey Mining Company.
She's all right for now. Miss Lara soft hearted on 'er. She gave her to Billy Crash. He was sweet on 'er.

Yep, Boss Man's gone. Poor Calvin. Poor goddamn Calvin. We're burnin' him in a few hours. At sunset. Should be real pretty.

Now I understand you didn't really have nuttin' to do wit it. It's that German sunbitch the trouble maker. You just wanted to git your girl, and hightail your nigger asses outta here. Now I appreciate that.
Now when it comes to making a nigger regret the error of his ways, believe me when I.
